orderSteps.companySelectionDesc: Select the company and order type for this order
orderSteps.enterCustomerEmailDescription: Enter the customer's email address to find their account or create a new one

orderSteps.addressSearchHint: ðŸ’¡ Start typing to find your address, or fill in the fields below manually
orderSteps.roomConfigurationDesc: Specify the rooms that need service
orderSteps.roomDescriptionPlaceholder:
Describe your rooms, furniture items, special requirements, etc.

Example:
- Living room: Large sofa, coffee table, TV stand
- Bedroom: King-size bed, 2 nightstands, wardrobe
- Any fragile or valuable items
orderSteps.roomDescriptionHint: Be as detailed as possible to help us provide an accurate offer
orderSteps.uploadImagesHint: Upload up to 10 images (max 10MB each, jpg/png)
orderSteps.maxImageSizeError: Each image must be less than 10MB
orderSteps.scheduleQuestion: When would you like the service? Any special requests?
orderSteps.dateAdvanceNotice: Must be at least 1 day in advance
orderSteps.scheduleNote: This is your preferred schedule. The company will confirm availability and may suggest alternative times in their offer.
orderSteps.additionalNotesPlaceholder:
Any special requirements, access instructions, parking information, or other details we should know...

Example:
- Building entry code: 1234
- Parking available in front
- Fragile antique furniture
- Need to complete before 3 PM
orderSteps.additionalNotesHint: Include any special instructions or requirements
orderSteps.submitDescription: Once you submit, your order will be sent to the company admin who will review it and send you an offer with pricing and schedule confirmation.
orderSteps.internalOfferDesc: Enter the pricing and schedule details for this internal order.
orderSteps.externalOfferNotice: Since you selected an external company, they will provide their own offer later. You don't need to enter any pricing details now.
orderSteps.externalFlowHint: The external company will receive this order and submit their price for your approval.
orderSteps.submitDescription: Once you submit, your order will be sent to the company admin who will review it and send you an offer with pricing and schedule confirmation.
orderSteps.noRoomsSpecified: Please go back and specify the number of rooms in the previous step.
